change:
WorldGuessr just got a massive update.

### 🎨 Major Improvements
- Complete redesign of the user interface with a modern, sleek look.
- Leaderboards fully functional including Past Day ELO.
- Better multiplayer reconnect system
- New round over screen for detailed postgame analysis!

### 📈 Revamped Profile Page
- Track your **ELO**, **XP**, and **ranks** over time with beautiful new graphs.
- See your growth, streaks, and slumps in a glance.
- Redesigned layout with better organization of your stats and achievements.

### 🗺️ Better Maps!
- Added support for **panoIds** (more precise control for creators)


Huge thanks to the community for the feedback and ideas that made this update possible 💙
